name: Second Layer
description:
Created during Ludum Dare 46 by two idiots.

A throwback to certain era of early indie games.

WASD/Arrows + Mouse for controls. If you need further instructions, check out the enclosed instruction book

WARNING: This game contains images. And insightfull writing.

(Absolutely no parts of this game was made seriously. If for some unforseen reason you choose to donate, all proceedings will be donated towards learning how to make proper games.)
